name: The Curse of Flames and Waves
name_original: The Curse of Flames and Waves
description:
This game was made for the global game jam 2022

Controls:

WASD - Move

Move mouse - Aim

Right click - Fire

Left click - Change stance

Space - Dash

Get close to the bonfires to recharge your  fire

Get in the water to recharge your water

Description:

Use the powers of fire and water to fight against hordes of skeletons. 

Run, shoot, level up, do whatever you need to survive!
